trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs> provides the <xref:System.Exception> that was caught in the binding process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs>提供<xref:System.Exception>攔截到的狀況中的繫結程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `BindingManagerBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`BindingManagerBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that occurred in the binding process that caused the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" />，發生於引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> 事件的繫結處理序中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> caught in the binding process that caused the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得在引發 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 事件的繫結處理序中所攔截到的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError" /> event to be raised.
The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `BindingManagerBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`BindingManagerBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
